MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Gordon Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.12am. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Fire Station substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.30am on the 2nd of February 2021.
